content:
There are many popular comic books that have been adapted into video games, here are some examples:

1. Batman: There have been dozens of Batman video games over the years, including the acclaimed Arkham series, which features voice talent from the acclaimed Batman: The Animated Series.

2. Spider-Man: Spider-Man video games date back to the early 1980s, but some of the most popular include Spider-Man (2000), Spider-Man 2 (2004), and Marvel's Spider-Man (2018).

3. The Walking Dead: The popular zombie comic book series was adapted into a critically acclaimed episodic video game series by Telltale Games.

4. Scott Pilgrim: The Scott Pilgrim comic book series was adapted into a retro-inspired beat 'em up game in 2010.

5. Watchmen: In 2009, a Watchmen video game was released as a companion to the film adaptation of the popular graphic novel.

These are just a few examples, there are many other popular comic books that have been adapted into video games over the years.
